posts.title: Pistachio Baklava
posts.content: This recipe is not gluten free.
posts.recipe:
*  phyllo dough sheets
* 1 c ghee, melted
* 1¼ c simmering water
* 3 c granulated sugar
* 3 slices lemon
* 1 lb. pistachio, raw, unsalted
* 1/3 c powdered sugar
* Honey 

1. In small pot, bring water, granulated sugar, lemon slices to a boil, then put on low to simmer until slightly thickened. Set aside & let cool before using. 
2. Preheat oven 350F. Grease an 8x8 baking dish with ghee. 
3. When taking out phyllo sheets, place a damp paper towel over them so they don’t dry out. 
4. Layer one phyllo sheet onto pan, then brush with ghee completely over the sheet. Place another phyllo sheet over the first one, followed by brushing it with ghee again. Continue this process until you’ve reached a total of 15 sheets. 
5. Pulse pistachios & powdered sugar in a food processor until small chunks. Spread a thin layer of the pistachio mix over the top layer of phyllo layers in baking dish. 
6. Continue making 10 more layers of phyllo sheet & ghee on top of pistachio layer. 
7. After 10 sheets, spread another even layer of pistachio mixture over the phyllo sheets. 
8. Start another phyllo & ghee set of layers 10-15 more. Finish off brushing a last layer of ghee on top. 
9. Using a sharp knife, cut your baklava into diamond shape rows, or whichever shape preferred. 
10. Bake for 35-40 mins checking top for a slightly golden brown at the 35 minute mark. 
11. Once baked, drizzle the lemon sugar mixture, honey, and sprinkle some of the crushed pistachio mixture all over baklava. Enjoy!
